content: each 4 row repeat eyelet increase eyelet decrease row 1 rs k to last 3 sts kfb sl2 wyif row 1 rs k to last 4 sts k2tog sl2 wyif row 2 ws k2 ssk yo to last 3 sts k1 row 2 ws k2 ssk yo to last 3 sts k1 sl2 sl2 wyif wyif row 3 k to last 2 sts sl2 wyif row 3 k to last 2 sts sl2 wyif row 4 as row 3 1 st increase for each 4 row repeat row 4 as row 3 1 st decrease for each 4 row repeat directions 󠄀 work garter stitch decrease 4 times rs co 5 sts 󠄀 and row 2 two more times 66 sts ws k3 sl2 wyif 󠄀 work eyelet row decrease 1 time 65 sts progress boxes are provided to check off each 󠄀 work garter stitch decrease 9 times 56 sts increase/decrease section 󠄀 work eyelet row decrease 1 time 55 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch increase 19 times 24 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch decrease 9 times 46 sts 󠄀 work eyelet row increase 1 time 25 sts 󠄀 work eyelet row decrease 1 time 45 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch increase 9 times 34 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch decrease 9 times 36 sts 󠄀 work eyelet row increase 1 time 35 sts 󠄀 work eyelet row decrease 1 time 35 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch increase 9 times 44 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch decrease 9 times 26 sts 󠄀 work eyelet row increase 1 time 45 sts 󠄀 work eyelet row decrease 1 time 25 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch increase 9 times 54 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch decrease 20 times 5 sts 󠄀 work eyelet row increase 1 time 55 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch increase 9 times 64 sts bind off last 5 sts 󠄀 work eyelet row increase 1 time 65 sts 󠄀 work garter stitch increase 4 times finishing 󠄀 and row 1 & 2 one more time 70 sts weave in loose ends using tapestry needle wet block to measurements i d love to see your finished shawl please share with me on instagram by tagging me @cooliemom and using the hashtag #pinkpanthershawl and follow me on ravelry at gceule for updates on future patterns if you need help or have any questions don t hesitate to contact me at gcoolie97@gmail com © copyright gretchen ceule 2024 pattern for individual use only do not copy or share
